issue.title: Client Protocol Upgrades

labels.name: C-feature
labels.description: Category: feature. This is adding a new feature.

labels.name: E-medium
labels.description: Effort: medium. Some knowledge of how hyper internal works would be useful.

issue.body:
(For handling server protocol upgrades, see #1323)

HTTP/1 allows starting a different protocol with an HTTP/1 request, and the desired protocol in an `Upgrade` header. We should support this.

Edit: removed bad API proposal.

body: If we made `Parts` implement Read/Write that could be a decent way of handling upgrades in a non-footgunny way. You could manually grab the existing buffered data and stream out separately or just use the type itself as the stream for the upgraded protocol.

> If we made Parts implement Read/Write

That's a definite possibility!

issue.title: feat(client): introduce lower-level Connection API
issue.body:
Adds the API described in #1449.

Closes #1449
